plot.content:
The space is distributed using two levels of circle packing and then connected with doodles filling using spirals and connecting them all with one curve.

Plotted on A3 watercolor paper using fountain pens (Turquoise and Amber).

The art will be put on auction and 100% will be given to https://github.com/teia-community/teia-docs/wiki/Ukranian-Fundraising.

Done during a live stream on https://twitch.tv/greweb

data.title: Packing of hope
data.description: The space is distributed using two levels of circle packing and then connected with doodles filling using spirals and connecting them all with one curve.

prev.content:
41047 circles are drawn with fountain pens on A3 watercolor paper. It took about 5 hours for the plotting robot to achieve this result. Inks used are Diamine Amber and Robert Oster Signature Fire and Ice.

The art has been put on auction and 100% is given to https://github.com/teia-community/teia-docs/wiki/Ukranian-Fundraising.

data.title: Tunnels of hope
data.description: 41047 circles are drawn with fountain pens on A3 watercolor paper. It took about 5 hours for the plotting robot to achieve this result. Inks used are Diamine Amber and Robert Oster Signature Fire and Ice.

next.content:
An experiment of reproducing sunflowers using a golden spiral and some perlin noise.

Done during a live stream on https://twitch.tv/greweb

data.title: Sunflowers overlap
data.description: An experiment of reproducing sunflowers using a golden spiral and some perlin noise.
